adv.js: { let ip_user = "" as any; await fetch("https://api.ipify.org?format=json") .then((response) => response.json()) .then((data) => (ip_user = data.ip)); await db.t_audit_trails.create({ data: { activity: "membuka halaman Profile PPDS Institution", ip_user: ip_user, id_user: user?.id, timestamp: new Date(), }, }); let data = await db.m_user.findFirst({ where: { id: user.id } }) local.name = data.display_name local.email = data.email local.address = data.address local.phone = data.phone local.render() }} > {children}
adv.jsBuilt: render(React.createElement("div",{...props},React.createElement(Local,{name:"local",value:{name:null,phone:null,email:null,address:null},effect:async e=>{let t="";await fetch("https://api.ipify.org?format=json").then(i=>i.json()).then(i=>t=i.ip),await db.t_audit_trails.create({data:{activity:"membuka halaman Profile PPDS Institution",ip_user:t,id_user:user?.id,timestamp:new Date}});let a=await db.m_user.findFirst({where:{id:user.id}});e.name=a.display_name,e.email=a.email,e.address=a.address,e.phone=a.phone,e.render()}},children)));

load.name: prop

adv.js: { if (isEditor) return; if (confirm("Yakin logout ?")) { localStorage.removeItem("mlsid"); let ip_user = "" as any; await fetch("https://api.ipify.org?format=json") .then((response) => response.json()) .then((data) => (ip_user = data.ip)); if (typeof user === "object") { await db.t_audit_trails.create({ data: { activity: "Logout PPDS", ip_user: ip_user, id_user: user.id, timestamp: new Date(), }, }); } navigate("/auth/login"); } }} > {children}
